body_html:
They should, although there have been cases when number of cores was misidentified on new architecture

They should, although there have been cases when number of cores was
misidentified on new architecture

body:
They should, although there have been cases when number of cores was
misidentified on new architecture

On Dec 26, 2016 8:05 PM, "Mohammad Babaeizadeh" <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> I assume you are referring to inter_op_parallelism_threads and
> intra_op_parallelism_threads. Aren't these set to the number of available
> cores by default?
>
